app.title: BrightByte
app.presentation: Who are you? Please, select your identity file and enter the security passphrase. Login in is a local operation, no information will be sent to any server or node.
app.fileNotLoaded: Please, first select a valid identity file
app.wrongFile: The format of the selected file is incorrect
app.connectionFailure: There is no node available for connection.
app.enterCredentials: Enter your credentials to sign in
app.termsDescription: BrightByte is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the License for the specific language governing permissions and limitations under the License. Contact your BrightByte provider for more information.
app.explanationText: In order to sign up for BrightByte you need to create and identity file. This identity file contains your public and private keys, being the private key protected with the password introduced below. Please enter the password to protect your identity file, read and agree the terms and conditions and click on the button to generate and download your identity file. IMPORTANT: do not lose your identity file, your user account fully depends on it and cannot be recovered in case of loss.
app.versionOutdated: Your BrightByte version is outdated. The page is going to refresh.

addCommit.title: Add commit
addCommit.noNewCommits: You don't have any new commits or PRs to import.
addCommit.addByBatch: Upload your commits and/or PRs by batch
addCommit.description: Make sure you pushed your commit the remote repository and paste here the URL of the commit or pull reuest
addCommit.notUrl: It is not a valid URL
addCommit.ownEmail: You can't review your own commit
addCommit.emptyInput: You must choose at least one reviewer
addCommit.unknownEmail: You have introduced an unknown email. Please, select a valid one.
addCommit.batchUploadPendingCommitsText: {{ numCommits }} commits and {{ numPrsNotUploaded }} PRs pending to uploaded
addCommit.repositoriesMissingInfo: Remote repositories not accessible. Please check that your BitBucket account is linked properly.
addCommit.bitbucketServiceNotAvailable: Bitbucket Provider not defined, feature not available. Please contact your BrightByte administrator to enable it.
addCommit.loadMoreRepositoriesMessage: Is the repository you were looking for not listed? Try load more repositories

commits.qualityDescription:
Quality of Code
This criterion measures how much the code complies with the software development principles and best practices (e.g. simplicity, cleanliness, readability, maintainability)
commits.difficultyDescription:
Difficulty
How much complex is the problem which this code solves?
commits.confidenceDescription:
Reviewer confidence
How much expertise do you consider to have in the technologies used in this commit?

home.title: Welcome,
home.info: Choose the available tabs to see your commits, reviews or the ranking. GitHub repo:

ranking.name: Name
ranking.nCommitsReviewByMe: Number of commits reviewed by me
ranking.nCommitsToReviewByMe: Number of commits to review by me
ranking.notQualified:
Not qualified yet
Still need to make {{pendingReviews}} reviews and {{pendingCommits}} commits to participate in the season. Your agreed percentage is {{agreedPercentage}}%

review.asked: You were asked to review a project on

review.noVote: This review has not been voted
review.negativeVote: The author disagrees with this review
review.positiveVote: The author agrees with this review
review.reviewEmptyRatingError: One or more star ratings are empty

setProfile.defaultError: You already have the default avatar image.
setProfile.changeNameError: Cannot change your user name. Please contact the service provider.

commitReview.title: Commit review
commitReview.description: Enter the explanation of your review

alerts.claimMsg: Do you want to make a complaint?
alerts.popUpWindowForBitbucket: You must allow popup windows to sync your bitbucket account.

achievements.unlockedAchievement: You have unlocked a new achievement

errors.backendOffline: Can't connect to BrightByte servers. Please try again later or contact your deployment administrator.

social.facebookShareText: I'm using BrightByte, a reputation network for code developers. Check it out at http://brightbyteapp.com
social.twitterShareText: I'm using BrightByte, a reputation network for code developers. Check it out at
social.achievementText: I've just got "{{title}}" achievement in BrightByte. Go check it out!

tutorialSlides.afterLoginTutorialCommitText1: Add your commits or PRs clicking on
tutorialSlides.afterLoginTutorialCommitText2: contribute button of the left side menu or in the upper right corner
tutorialSlides.afterLoginTutorialCommitText3: of commits page. You can do it manually or by batch with the BitBucket integration:
tutorialSlides.afterLoginTutorialReviewText1: Review your 'colleagues' code. There are 3 categories to rate:
tutorialSlides.afterLoginTutorialRankingText: In ranking page you can check your position based on your reputation. BrightByte ranking is divided in seasons in which every user has a chance to get to the first place. There is also a global ranking in which you are able to check your calculated engagement index.
tutorialSlides.afterLoginTutorialFinalText: Start uploading and reviewing your first commits or PRs
